issue.title: v0.17.1 testing
issue.body:
Link to binaries:
* v0.17.1rc1 : https://bitcoincore.org/bin/bitcoin-core-0.17.1/test.rc1/

Let us know which version you tested on which operating system. You can also report issues you found here, but please search Github for known issues first.

See [Release Notes](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/v0.17.1rc1/doc/release-notes.md#notable-changes) for a list of changes, for an idea what to test.

Maintainers: feel free to close if you think this is a bad idea :-)

---
tACK v0.17.1rc1 on macOS 10.14.1:
* tested installing from (unsigned) DMG
* testing sending coins

events.body:
tACK v0.17.1rc1 (macOS 10.13.6, Linux Mint 19):
- (re)installing from DMG (signed, macOS only)
- sending/receiving
- GUI (windows, menus, notifications)
Sanity checked installing (64 bit) and starting sync on Windows 10 (version in screenshot). No crash on shutdown:
Tested compiling/sanity checked on Ubuntu 18.10, both with depends (qt 5.9.6) and apt installed (qt 5.11.1) dependencies:
Tested installing and running the `x86_64-linux-gnu bitcoin-qt` binary on a new Fedora 29-1.2 VM:
Not sure if it is related especially to v0.17.1rc1, but #14976 was spotted during testing.
Tested on Windows 10 Enterprise 1709. Everything I tested work as expected.
Closing now that v0.17.1 final has been [tagged](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/releases/tag/v0.17.1).
